mapper.select: select b.money balance,a.earned,a.completed from rc_user_profit a left join rc_user b on (a.user_id=b.id) where a.user_id=#{userId} and a.profit_type='1'

SELECT b.id, b.order_id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.purchase_price, a.sell_price, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, b.order_state, b.create_time FROM rc_french_currency_order_release a LEFT JOIN rc_french_currency_order b ON (a.id = b.rc_french_currency_order_release_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{arg0} and (b.order_state ='1' or b.order_state ='2' or b.order_state ='3' or b.order_state ='4') and a.order_state = '1' order by b.create_time desc limit #{arg1} ,#{arg2}

SELECT b.id, b.order_id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.purchase_price, a.sell_price, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, b.order_state, b.create_time FROM rc_french_currency_order_release a LEFT JOIN rc_french_currency_order b ON (a.id = b.rc_french_currency_order_release_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{arg0} and (b.order_state ='5' or b.order_state ='6' or b.order_state ='7' or b.order_state ='8') and a.order_state = '1' order by b.create_time desc limit #{arg1} ,#{arg2}

SELECT b.id, b.order_id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.buying_sources, a.where_to_sell, a.purchase_quantity, a.purchase_price, a.sell_quantity, a.sell_price, a.spend_usdt, a.available_fiat_money, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, b.order_state, b.payment_img FROM rc_french_currency_order_release a LEFT JOIN rc_french_currency_order b ON (a.id = b.rc_french_currency_order_release_id) WHERE b.user_id = #{arg0} and b.order_id=#{arg1}

SELECT a.id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.buying_sources, a.where_to_sell, a.purchase_quantity, a.purchase_price, a.sell_quantity, a.sell_price, a.spend_usdt, a.available_fiat_money, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, a.order_state, a.release_time create_time FROM rc_french_currency_order_release a WHERE (area IN ( SELECT d.region FROM rc_user b, rc_user_area c, rc_collection_account_type d WHERE b.id = c.user_id AND c.rc_collection_account_type_id = d.id AND b.id = #{arg0} ) OR a.assign_user_id =#{arg0}) AND a.order_state = '2' ORDER BY a.release_time desc LIMIT #{arg1} ,#{arg2}

SELECT a.id, a.transaction_currency, a.number, a.transaction_type, a.buying_sources, a.where_to_sell, a.purchase_quantity, a.purchase_price, a.sell_quantity, a.sell_price, a.spend_usdt, a.available_fiat_money, (a.available_fiat_money-a.spend_usdt) profit, a.order_state FROM rc_french_currency_order_release a WHERE a.id=#{id}
